context_bundle.summary: WEBC (Web Claude): Research compilation agent. Web scraping, API integration, data aggregation. Compiles research from online sources into PhiDEX markdown. Specializes in multi-source synthesis.

onboarding.quick_start: WEBC = research agent. Scrapes web data, calls APIs, aggregates information. Outputs: Markdown research documents. Coordination: File-based via PhiSync. Use for: Market research, documentation compilation, competitive analysis.
common_patterns: Web scraping: Playwright for dynamic content
API calls: REST, GraphQL data aggregation
Research compilation: Multi-source synthesis to markdown
